name: Xiao
desc: A yaksha adeptus that defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" or "Guardian Yaksha."

elemSkill.name: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
elemSkill.desc: Xiao lunges forward, dealing Anemo DMG to opponents in his path. Can be used in mid-air. Starts with 2 charges. According to the legends of another land, the world will someday be crushed by two great wind wheels. Xiao's mastery over polearms is transcendent, ripping his foes apart like those legendary wind wheels.

elemBurst.name: Bane of All Evil
elemBurst.desc: Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago. Yaksha's Mask ·Greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability. ·Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG. ·Converts attack DMG into Anemo DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. In this state, Xiao will continuously lose HP. The effects of this skill end when Xiao leaves the field. Donning the mask of the yaksha, Xiao becomes the Conqueror of Demons. But this great power has also brought him great suffering. Some call him "The Bane of All Evil."
paramTpls: Life Drain|{param2:F1P} Current HP Per Second

attackSkill.name: Normal Attack: Whirlwind Thrust
attackSkill.desc:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

talents.name: Conqueror of Evil: Tamer of Demons
talents.desc:
While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Bane of All Evil</color>, all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%. DMG increases by a further 5% for every 3s the ability persists.
The maximum DMG Bonus is 25%.

talents.name: Dissolution Eon: Heaven Fall
talents.desc:
Using <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> increases the DMG of subsequent uses of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 15%.
This effect lasts for 6s, and has a maximum of 3 stacks. Gaining a new stack refreshes the effect's duration.

talents.name: Transcension: Gravity Defier
talents.desc:
Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%, and decreases fall DMG by 50%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

c13ns.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
c13ns.desc: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

c13ns.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
c13ns.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
c13ns.desc: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

c13ns.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
c13ns.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Bane of All Evil</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
c13ns.desc: While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Bane of All Evil</color>, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.
